game_description: 【Own An Island Here】 MageCosmos is an open world where your adventures are unlimited. Your incredible journey starts on a magical floating island with your own cozy house on it, like everybody else. Looking around, you will find neighbors living on the same island as you do. This is a HUGE world! 【Farm&Factory, Keep It Running】 Your life on the island depends pretty much on how you manage it. You have a big farm to grow various plants, feed animals, use your harvest to manufacture new items, and complete orders requested over the community to get huge amounts of MageCoins in return while having fun! 【Friends With Neighbors, Even Not With Real Human】 Speaking of that, friends are important or it'll be so lonely in such a big world, shake hands with whoever you meet to become friends with and send gifts to them. You can also use a small rocket, fly around and explore the islands. Some AI live there and they're desperate to meet visitors, ask them anything you want! 【Mini-Games And Worlds】 As is implied in the name "Cosmos", we are creating diverse styles of worlds to travel across, and party games for you and your friends to play together...It's going to be fun!
review_1: When I saw the trailer for this game I wasn't sure about it, but I thought I would give it a try anyways.. Glad I didn't make the decision to bypass this one based on what I saw in the trailer. New to VR/Quest (just little over a month now), but this game is impressive. My only issue is that since this game just be launched for about 2 months, there are not so many players in it so sometimes I cannot complete the tasks. But I'm glad their developers are friendly and helpful, and they would like to play it with me. Can't wait to see the future development of this one!
review_2: On behalf of the MageCosmos team, we would like to express our deepest gratitude to all of our early players who have supported us throughout our journey in creating this VR social gaming platform. Our team is made up of passionate VR enthusiasts who have worked tirelessly to bring this platform to life. We recognize that none of this would have been possible without your early support, and we are honored to have you as part of our community. We will continue to strive to provide you with the best possible VR social gaming experience, and we look forward to sharing many more exciting moments with you on MageCosmos. Thank you again for your support, and we hope to continue growing together.
review_3: Nice game with big potential, enjoy the farm sim though there are few people. 5 stars for the great concept!
review_4: discover something new each time i play it
review_5: Not sure what this game is. Haven’t been able to find anyone playing on it. The one game I saw that was a castle defend type game was ok but buggy. Potential….Keep your eye on this.
